channel.title: Fixing Drops
channel.description: Ok, i've been wanting to know how to do this for some time now. my jad only drops fire capes but I want it to drop Torsos, gloves etc. I've tried editing it's drops in npcdrops.cfg but it still only drops capes. A mate tld me use item3.java, but it didnt work there either. So i've come to you guys, any help?

item.title: Fixing Drops
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

I suggest using my tut…
It is easier to understand and explains fully…

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Drops
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

open your npchandler.java and find this.
"if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == "
without the 66 and 99 quotes of course.

then search the monsters id number.
and after you find it it should look somethign like this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCID) 
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.random||SOMETHING HERE||(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

copy the part thats after the randome. the place that says ||SOMETHING HERE|| in the one above.

then after copying it look at the part that says “addItem(Item3.random”
and whatever the “item3.”
says is what java yu will go to. in this case item3.java

then after you open that java search your ||SOMETHING HERE||
and it will show the item ids right beside yor results allmost

Read full topic
